items.title: Chrome Trust & Reputation Hardening
items.description: Patch-level release focused on trust stabilization. Removes legacy chat.openai.com host permission (redirects to chatgpt.com anyway), verifies local-only privacy claims, updates store listing to match code behavior.

items.title: Release docs, version sync, and GitHub Pages setup
items.description: Enable GitHub Pages for privacy policy hosting, add open:privacy script, sync package.json/manifest.json versions, document release process in RELEASING.md, and clarify automated vs manual release steps.

items.title: CWS Enhanced Safe Browsing trust warning
items.description: Chrome shows 'Proceed with caution - This extension is not trusted by Enhanced Safe Browsing' during install. Not a code bug - distribution trust issue. DONE: Added hosted privacy policy (docs/privacy.html), landing page (docs/index.html), README install guidance. READY FOR PR.

items.title: Enable GitHub Pages for privacy policy hosting
items.description: After merging chore/cws-trust-optimization: Go to repo Settings > Pages, set Source to 'main' branch '/docs' folder. URL will be https://wilmoore.github.io/browser-extension-conversation-titles-chatgpt/privacy.html

items.title: Update CWS listing with privacy policy URL
items.description: After GitHub Pages is live: Go to CWS Store Listing Editor, set Privacy Policy URL to https://wilmoore.github.io/browser-extension-conversation-titles-chatgpt/privacy.html, save and submit for review.

items.title: CWS search metrics automation and store assets
items.description: Build Playwright-based automation to track Chrome Web Store search rankings for key phrases (Conversation, Conversation Title, Conversation Titles for ChatGPT). Store history in JSONL format. Also improve store listing assets: AI-generated screenshot concepts and pixel-perfect Figma icon exports.

items.title: CWS command naming confusion
items.description: cws:dashboard command opened extension edit page instead of developer console dashboard. Renamed commands for clarity: cws:console (dev console), cws:edit (extension edit page), cws:listing (public store listing).

items.title: Add commands to open CWS dashboard and listing
items.description: Add make targets and npm scripts to open Chrome Web Store developer dashboard and public listing page. cws-dashboard opens dev console (useful pre-publish), cws-open opens public listing (useful post-publish). Auto-detect OS for browser open command.

items.title: Title not showing in custom GPTs
items.description: Conversation titles display consistently everywhere except custom GPTs. Root cause: Footer detection relies on hardcoded text patterns ('ChatGPT can make mistakes') but custom GPTs can show different text like 'New version of GPT available...' Solution: Use structural/positional detection instead of text-pattern matching.

items.title: Icon refresh - Ț glyph design
items.description: Update extension icon to refined Ț glyph with charcoal on off-white color scheme. Replace cartoonish chain-link icon with clean, editorial serif letterform. DEFERRED: SVG renders well but PNG generation at small sizes (16, 32, 48px) produces blurry results. Need alternative methodology - either manual pixel-perfect creation in design tool or different rendering approach.

items.title: Title not rendering when new conversation starts
items.description: When starting a new conversation, the title fails to render even though document.title is set. Root cause: When footer element doesn't exist during initial streaming, render fails but currentContext is still set. On subsequent DOM updates, all render conditions are false so it never retries. Missing condition: need to retry render when currentContext is set but currentElementRef is null.

items.title: Click handlers not attached after React re-render
items.description: Chrome Web Store rejection: click shortcuts for different copy formats functionality not working. Root cause: When ChatGPT's React re-renders the footer and replaces the DOM element, the extension only checks if context changed (title/URL), not if the element was replaced. New elements have correct attributes but no event handlers attached.

items.title: Add unit tests for options.ts
items.description: The options page script has no corresponding test file. Functions like loadPreferences, savePreferences, applyI18n, updateModifierLabels should have test coverage.

items.title: Add unit tests for preferences.ts
items.description: The preferences storage module has no corresponding test file. Functions like loadPreferences, savePreferences, onPreferencesChange should have unit tests.

items.title: Add ARIA labels to options page form controls
items.description: Select elements (click, shiftClick, modClick, modShiftClick) lack aria-label or aria-labelledby attributes. The toggle checkbox also lacks proper ARIA labeling. Screen readers may not properly associate labels with controls.

items.title: Update README copy shortcuts documentation
items.description: README documents default shortcuts as Click=title, Shift+Click=project+title, but actual defaults in src/types/index.ts show Click=MARKDOWN, Shift+Click=FULL_CONTEXT. Documentation should reflect actual defaults.
